content.value:
Villacandelaria is located in the Candelaria District, Bogota downtown historical neighborhood.

This area hosts a concentration of cultural places in the city such as universities, museums, colonial houses, churches, and a magical environment that is one of the most enigmatic places in all Latin America.

At VillaCandelaria we offer dormitories and private rooms with a bathroom, where you can enjoy hot water 24 hours a day.

There is a kitchen well-stocked with cooking and eating utensils for your entire disposition.

Local calls are free of charge.

We also provide laundry service. For your entertainment we have free Internet and Wi-Fi in the lobby and in the rooms, a Television room with Cable and DVD Library, and Hammocks.

To share with the rest of guests you have access to a billiard table and board games, or you can simply enjoy a good cup of coffee or why not a cold beer

description.description: Villa Candelaria Hostel Bogota is a comfortable base when in Bogota and is close to everything the area has to offer. It also offers free wireless internet. There are a range of facilities on offer to those staying at the hostel, including a 24-hour reception and a laundry service. The hostel's rooms are comfortable and offer a kitchenette and a private bathroom.
